title: One Piece Episode 352 Recap
author: [swim squad]
description: Detailed recap and review of Episode 352, covering Brook's flashback to discovering the salt weakness, his first defeat by Ryuma, and Oars' food adventure. The reviewer provides character analysis and rates the episode 4.5 Important Afros/5, praising the episode for 'hi-jinks aplenty' with Oars breaking down walls and Brook's past where he chases zombies despite being dead himself.

title: 352 & 353: 'A Belief Worth Begging to Live for!! Brook Defends His Afro' and 'A Man's Promise Never Dies!!'
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: Episode commentary from a blogger documenting their first watch-through of One Piece. Discusses Brook's character development, the significance of his afro as a connection to Laboon, and notes that 'Brook vs. Ryuuma is beautifully animated.' The reviewer states '352 was pretty good. Great fight scenes.'

title: RYUMA VS BROOK | One Piece Episode 352 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Bilibili Content Creator
description: Couples reaction video focusing on the Brook vs Ryuma confrontation in Episode 352. Features live reactions and discussion about the episode's events, Brook's determination, and the significance of the afro to his character.

title: Brook Knows Laboon REVEAL || One Piece Episode 352 - 354 REACTION
author: Bilibili Content Creator
description: Multi-episode reaction video covering Episodes 352-354, with focus on Brook's connection to Laboon and the emotional weight of his promise. Discusses the revelation of why Brook's afro is so important to him.

title: Watch One Piece Reaction - Thriller Bark - Episode 352 353
author: Streamable User
description: Reaction video covering Episodes 352-353 of the Thriller Bark arc, featuring viewer responses to Brook's backstory, the afro's significance, and the beginning of the climactic duel with Ryuma.

title: Thriller Bark Symbolism - Analysis - One Piece
author: OP Fanpage
description: In-depth analysis of Thriller Bark's symbolism including discussion of Episode 352's themes. Explores how Brook's confrontation with Zombie Ryuma represents Brook facing his own depression and past failures personified, with Ryuma being 'literally and metaphorically, a shadow of Brook.'

title: One Piece: How Brook's Story Hints at the One Piece Treasure
author: Game Rant
description: Article analyzing Brook's character arc and presenting the theory that the One Piece treasure might be an afro. Draws connections between Brook's desperate protection of his afro in Episode 352 and larger series mysteries, suggesting the afro could allow recognition by ancient beings like Laboon.

title: Who is Ryuma in One Piece?
author: Sportskeeda
description: Character profile and analysis of Ryuma explaining his legendary status as a dragon-slaying samurai from Wano Country, his zombie form in Thriller Bark, and his significance in Episode 352's confrontation with Brook.
